verses.verse: And <WG1161> working together <WG4903> with him we entreat <WG3870> also <WG2532> that ye <WG5209> receive <WG1209> not <WG3361> the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> in <WG1519> vain <WG2756>

but <WG235> in <WG1722> everything <WG3956> commending <WG4921> ourselves <WG1438>, as <WG5613> ministers <WG1249> of God <WG2316>, in <WG1722> much <WG4183> patience <WG5281>, in <WG1722> afflictions <WG2347>, in <WG1722> necessities <WG318>, in <WG1722> distresses <WG4730>,

in <WG1722> pureness <WG54>, in <WG1722> knowledge <WG1108>, in <WG1722> long suffering <WG3115>, in <WG1722> kindness <WG5544>, in <WG1722> the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151>, in <WG1722> love <WG26> unfeigned <WG505>,

by <WG1223> glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> dishonor <WG819>, by <WG1223> evil report <WG1426> and <WG2532> good report <WG2162>; as <WG5613> deceivers <WG4108>, and <WG2532> yet true <WG227>;

as <WG5613> unknown <WG50>, and <WG2532> yet well known <WG1921>; as <WG5613> dying <WG599>, and <WG2532> behold <WG2400>, we live <WG2198>; as <WG5613> chastened <WG3811>, and <WG2532> not <WG3361> killed <WG2289>;

as <WG5613> sorrowful <WG3076>, yet <WG1161> always <WG104> rejoicing <WG5463>; as <WG5613> poor <WG4434>, yet <WG1161> making <WG4148> many <WG4183> rich <WG4148>; as <WG5613> having <WG2192> nothing <WG3367>, and <WG2532> yet possessing <WG2722> all things <WG3956>.
Our <WG2257> mouth <WG4750> is open <WG455> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209>, O Corinthians <WG2881>, our <WG2257> heart <WG2588> is enlarged <WG4115>.
Ye are <WG4729> not <WG3756> straitened <WG4729> in <WG1722> us <WG2254>, but <WG1161> ye are straitened <WG4729> in <WG1722> your own <WG5216> affections <WG4698>.
Now <WG1161> for a recompense <WG489> in like kind <WG846> (I speak <WG3004> as unto <WG5613> my children <WG5043>), be <WG4115> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> enlarged <WG4115>.

Be <WG1096> not <WG3361> unequally yoked <WG2086> with unbelievers <WG571>: for <WG1063> what <WG5101> fellowship <WG3352> have righteousness <WG1343> and <WG1161> iniquity <WG458>? or <WG1161> what <WG5101> communion <WG2842> hath light <WG5457> with <WG2532> darkness <WG4655>?

And <WG1161> what <WG5101> agreement <WG4783> hath a temple <WG3485> of God <WG2316> with <WG3326> idols <WG1497>? for <WG1063> we <WG5210> are <WG2075> a temple <WG3485> of the living <WG2198> God <WG2316>; even as <WG2531> God <WG2316> said <WG3754>, I will dwell <WG1774> in <WG1722> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> walk in <WG1704> them <WG2532>; and I will be <WG2071> their <WG846> God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> they <WG846> shall be <WG2071> my <WG3427> people <WG2992>.

Wherefore <WG1352> Come ye out <WG1831> from <WG1537> among <WG3319> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> be ye separate <WG873>, saith <WG3004> the Lord <WG2962>, And <WG2532> touch <WG680> no unclean <WG169> thing <WG2532>; And I <WG2504> will receive <WG1523> you <WG5209>,
